full_summary:
# [Request for Proposal (RFP) for Arctic Sealift Fuel](#request-for-proposal-rfp-for-arctic-sealift-fuel)

## **RFP Title and Reference**

* **English Title**: E60HL-230007_A RFP Arctic Sealift Drummed Fuel
* **French Title**: E60HL-230007_A DDP Carburant en barils pour le pont océanique de l'arctique
* **Reference Number**: WS3974381338-Doc3985111419
* **Amendment Number**: 3

## **RFP Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3974381338
* **Publication Date**: April 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **RFP Status**: Expired

## **Goods and Services Procurement**

* **UNSPSC Categories**:
	+ *15100000* - Fuels
	+ *15120000* - Lubricants and oils and greases and anti-corrosives
	+ *15121508* - Transmission oil
	+ *15121530* - Heat transfer oil or fluid

## **Notice and Contract Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Variations or combinations of the above methods

## **Trade Agreements**

* **Applicable Trade Agreements**:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## **Contact and Submission Information**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Jackson Hiltz (SPAC/PSP
